description: A Next.js page component that renders a recipe detail view, dynamically generating static parameters for static site generation based on a mock data source, and displaying recipe information including title, image, description, ingredients, and instructions.

methods.name: generateStaticParams
methods.description: Asynchronously generates static route parameters from mock recipe data for static site generation.

methods.name: RecipePage
methods.description: Main React component function that renders the recipe detail page based on route parameters.
